entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.8°C

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
